mapper.select: select user_name, password, user_type, email, mobile_num, confirmed, veri_code from user_info where user_name = #{userName}
mapper.insert: insert into user_info(user_name, password, user_type, email, mobile_num, confirmed, veri_code) values (#{user_name},#{password},#{user_type},#{email},#{mobile_num},#{confirmed},#{veri_code})
mapper.update: update user_info set confirmed="Y" where user_name=#{userName}
update user_info set password=#{password} where user_name=#{user_name}
